keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will vote to preserve our NHS against privatisation to companies who are only interested in making profits out of it.
I have consistently supported having a referendum on whether we remain a member of the EU and will continue to do so.
I will support the minimum wage being increased to £8 per hour and the banning of zero hour contracts.
I will support proposals to make multi-national companies, which make their profits in this country, pay their Corporation Tax paid here – not tax havens.
I will support balanced migration – not unrestrained immigration – so that the size of our population can be controlled.

mentions.candidate: I will vote to preserve our NHS against privatisation...

issues.brexitEurope: I have consistently supported having a referendum on whether we remain a member of the EU...
issues.economy: Tory and Lib Dem 5 Year Record of Shame ... Raised tuition fees to £9000 a year - breaking their 2010 election promise. More than balance the books borrowing £207bn failed to rise promised.
issues.education: Cut rate of tax for the wealthiest by 5%. Hit young people by scrapping Child Trust Funds, Educational Maintenance Allowance and cutting Child Benefit.
issues.health: The Tories have said they want to cut public spending back to the levels of the 1930s - before the NHS was born...
issues.immigration: I will support balanced migration – not unrestrained immigration – so that the size of our population can be controlled.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Tories have said they want to cut public spending back to the levels of the 1930s - before the NHS was born...

quotes.text: "To serve the people, to protect our NHS, and to improve the quality of life for all in Hall Green."

images.caption: Vote Roger Godsiff on Thursday 7 May
